titleStmt.title: Articles to be inquired of, in the first metropoliticall visitation, of the most reuerend father, Richarde by Gods prouidence, archbushop [sic] of Canterbury, and primat of all Englande in, and for the dioces of Noruuich, in the yeare of our Lorde God 1605, and in the first yeare of His Graces translation.
titleStmt.author: Church of England. Province of Canterbury. Archbishop (1604-1610 : Bancroft)
Bancroft, Richard, 1544-1610.

notesStmt.note: Reproduction of original in the Durham University Library.
